subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Tour de France is won in bed, as the revered maxim says, but the World Cup has caused many riders to miss sleep in favor of soccer during the early stages this year.
snippet: The Tour de France is won in bed, as the revered maxim says, but the World Cup has caused many riders to miss sleep in favor of soccer during the early stages this year.
